lead_paragraph: CHAPEY--Regent Dr. Geraldine D.,on February 9, 2016 of Belle Harbor, NY. Beloved wife of the late Robert J. Chapey. Proud and devoted mother of Dr. Geraldine M. Chapey and Dr. Roberta Chapey. Dr. Chapey served for 15 years on the Board of Regents of the University of the State of New York, Dean of Graduate and Undergraduate School of Education at St. John's University, President of School Board 27, Professor at CUNY, Trustee for Cathedral College and for numerous professional and community organizations. Reposing at the Denis S. O'Connor Funeral Home, 91-05 Beach Channel Drive, Rockaway Beach, NY. Visiting Tuesday 2-5 and 7-9pm. Celebration of the Liturgy of Christian Burial, Wednesday, 9:45am at St. Francis De Sales R.C. Church, 129-16 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Belle Harbor, NY. Interment St. John's Cemetery, Middle Village, New York. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CHAPEY, REGENT DR. GERALDINE D.
